name: Ridiculous Golfing
description:
This game was made for the Brakeys Game Jam2020.1.
The theme was 'Holes' and I decided to create a small golf game with unity.

Feedback and rating are well apprechiated.

I also post  regulary game dev content on my You Tube channel:
